skills.text: Negate the attack. Then, if your Leader Card is ＜Majin Buu＞, you may place 1 card from your hand in the Drop Area. If you do so, choose 1 of your ＜Majin Buu＞ and 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 3 or less. Place the chosen opponent Battle Card under the chosen ＜Majin Buu＞.
